title: How to Check Your Account Balance on a Virgin Mobile Phone

steps.title: Dial the balance code for your region.
steps.content: Dial the balance code for your region. Depending on your region, you may have a special number you can dial in the Phone app that will automatically display your available balance. Some regions will require you to text a word to a specific number to receive the balance instead. Dial the code that's appropriate for your region to get the balance: [1] X Research source Canada: Dial #999 Chile: Dial *151# Colombia: Dial *10# Ireland: Text the word "Balance" to 78900 Kuwait: Dial *145# Mexico: Dial *188# Polska (Poland): Dial *101# Saudi Arabia (KSA): Dial *102# South Africa: Dial *103*4# United Arab Emirates: Dial *145# United Kingdom: Text the word "Balance" to 78900

steps.title: Go to https://www.virginmedia.com/myvmo2 and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://www.virginmedia.com/myvmo2 and log in. You can use any desktop web browser to do this.

steps.title: Tap a bill to view.
steps.content: Tap a bill to view. You'll see a drop-box under the header "View bills" that you can use to select a bill to view.

steps.title: Navigate to the Your credits tab.
steps.content: Navigate to the Your credits tab. You'll see here if you have any extra credits or not on your account. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Review your usage and any remaining balance that you have.
steps.content: Review your usage and any remaining balance that you have. You'll see your used data and any that you have remaining as well as how many days are left in the billing cycle. If you're in Canada, you may need to use the Canada site instead.

steps.title: Open Virgin Plus My Account.
steps.content: Open Virgin Plus My Account. This app says "Virgin Plus" on a red and black background. If you don't have the mobile app, you can download it for free from the Google Play Store and App Store. Sign in with your Virgin account if you aren't already.

steps.title: Tap Usage.
steps.content: Tap Usage . It's a tab at the bottom of your screen with a pie chart icon.

steps.title: Review your usage and any remaining balance that you have.
steps.content: Review your usage and any remaining balance that you have. You'll see your used data and any that you have remaining as well as how many days are left in the billing cycle.
